name: Magic color cube - 3D Block classic games
name_original: Magic color cube - 3D Block classic games
description:
Cube - 3D Block Classic Games is amazing block puzzle game with a simple rule.
Endless time of game play.
New from Apppunya games.

Place the falling blocks correctly in order to clear layers!

Swipe left or right to rotate the platform, and match falling blocks. Complete layers to destroy cubes and never let the tower reach the limit!

Collect diamonds to unlock new platforms.

You can play anytime and anywhere! We really hope you enjoy it!
Quickly , let's try the game.
